content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: Hello Nesibe, it was great to meet you. Based on our discussions, I propose a rental price of 600 euros per month. This is a fair market value for a 25 square meter apartment in this area. Is that something you can agree to?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: I would need to check with my family and my financial situation before I can make a decision. Is there anything I can do to secure the rental agreement in writing?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Certainly, Nesibe. I understand that you need some time to consider the proposal. In the meantime, you can secure the rental agreement in writing by signing a lease agreement with the landlord. This will legally bind you to the terms and conditions of the rental agreement, including the rental price, payment schedule, and any other relevant details. Once you have signed the lease agreement, you can proceed with the negotiation and sign the final rental agreement once you have reached an agreement with the landlord.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content:
I have consulted with my family and my financial situation, and I am willing to agree to the rental price of 600 euros per month. Thank you for considering my request.

I understand that the lease agreement will be a legal document, and I am willing to sign the lease agreement to secure the rental agreement. Can you please provide me with the lease agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Of course, Nesibe. I will prepare the lease agreement for you to review and sign. The lease agreement will include the rental price, payment schedule, the term of the lease, and any other relevant details. Once you have reviewed the lease agreement, you can sign it and submit it to me for review. Once I have reviewed the signed lease agreement, we can proceed with the final rental agreement and secure the rental agreement for you.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi
